unnormalised: Arre yaar, weather is always a gamble for us farmers! Remember the droughts in Vidarbha back in 2016? Total loss. Now the IMD forecast says less monsoon on 10/07/2024. Will it affect the paddy crop? My neighbor, Ramu Kaka, says it's all karma. Last year, we got too much rain at 17:00 hrs on 23/08/2023. Guess we'll see what 2025 brings. Jai Kisan!
normalised: Arre yaar, weather is always a gamble for us farmers! Remember the droughts in Vidarbha back in two thousand and sixteen? Total loss. Now the I M D forecast says less monsoon on tenth july two thousand and twenty four. Will it affect the paddy crop? My neighbor, Ramu Kaka, says it's all karma. Last year, we got too much rain at five P.M. on twenty third august two thousand and twenty three. Guess we'll see what two thousand and twenty five brings. Jai Kisan!
